lolPatch.champAbout: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be, but those who intend to do her harm will soon witness her true colors revealed, and feel the full power of her primordial spirit magic unleashed upon them.
lolPatch.Summary: Neeko Midscope update, all abilities adjusted.

Attributes.Name: Neeko Get Sho'Ma!
Attributes.Label: updated
Attributes.After: When Neeko is near a non-epic monster, minion, trap, ward, or plant for two seconds she stores their Sho'Ma. Neeko can click on her bar to become that unit. Click on Neeko's face to return to Neeko. Click on the little “X” to clear out Neeko's current Sho'Ma. Only one unit can be stored at a time.

Attributes.Name: Neeko Disguise is Durable!
Attributes.Label: updated
Attributes.After: Disguise no longer breaks on taking damage, only when the disguised self would have died or when you are crowd controlled.

Attributes.Name: Neeko for Speedo
Attributes.Label: removed
Attributes.After: Neeko no longer inherits base attack speed/move speed from disguised target if that stat is higher than hers.

Attributes.Name: Area of Effect Size
Attributes.Label: Buff
Attributes.After: 250 (Note: Max range E snares should always be hittable with Q now)

Attributes.Name: Jungle Tomato
Attributes.Label: new
Attributes.After: Q now deals 30/40/50/60/70 bonus damage to monsters

Attributes.Name: Better Blooms
Attributes.Label: new
Attributes.After: Casting Q beyond its maximum range will now cast the ability at maximum range instead of having Neeko walk into position to throw it.

Attributes.Name: Neeko Move Neeko
Attributes.Label: new
Attributes.After: After casting Neeko can reactivate to send the clone to a new location

Attributes.Name: Neeko Funny!
Attributes.Label: new
Attributes.After: Clone now plays animations and sounds of Q/E/Dance/Joke/Taunt/Recall/Laugh and survives for their duration

Attributes.Name: Neeko Jungle!
Attributes.Label: updated
Attributes.After: Empowered Attacks deal 50 bonus damage to monsters

Attributes.Name: Neeko is Become One
Attributes.Label: updated
Attributes.After: Neeko's clone spawns 100 units in front of her ⇒ Neeko's clone spawns directly on top of her

Attributes.Name: Adjusted Ultimate
Attributes.Label: updated
Attributes.After: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, Neeko jumps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies for 0.6 seconds. Neeko then crashes to the ground with all knocked up enemies, dealing magic damage to them and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Attributes.Name: Neeko Need No Shield!
Attributes.Label: removed
Attributes.After: Neeko no longer gains a shield when channeling her R

lolPatch.champAbout: Once honored defenders of Shurima against the Void, Aatrox and his brethren would eventually become an even greater threat to Runeterra, and were defeated only by cunning mortal sorcery. But after centuries of imprisonment, Aatrox was the first to find freedom once more, corrupting and transforming those foolish enough to try and wield the magical weapon that contained his essence. Now, with stolen flesh, he walks Runeterra in a brutal approximation of his previous form, seeking an apocalyptic and long overdue vengeance.
lolPatch.Summary: Passive damage increased. R movement speed increased.

Attributes.Name: Bonus Physical Damage
Attributes.Label: buff
Attributes.Before: 4-10% (based on level) of target's maximum health
Attributes.After: 4-12% (based on level) of target's maximum health

lolPatch.champAbout: Legend claims that Amumu is a lonely and melancholy soul from ancient Shurima, roaming the world in search of a friend. Doomed by an ancient curse to remain alone forever, his touch is death, his affection ruin. Those who claim to have seen him describe a living cadaver, small in stature and wrapped in creeping bandages. Amumu has inspired myths, songs, and folklore told and retold for generations—such that it is impossible to separate truth from fiction.

Attributes.Name: Percent Health Magic Damage per Second
Attributes.Label: buff

lolPatch.champAbout: A nightmarish empress created from the raw material of an entire devoured city, Bel'Veth is the end of Runeterra itself... and the beginning of a monstrous reality of her own design. Driven by epochs of repurposed history, knowledge, and memories from the world above, she voraciously feeds an ever-expanding need for new experiences and emotions, consuming all that crosses her path. Yet her wants could never be sated by only one world as she turns her hungry eyes toward the Void's old masters...
lolPatch.Summary: Attack damage growth decreased. Q damage to monsters increased.

lolPatch.champAbout: A manic and impulsive criminal from Zaun, Jinx lives to wreak havoc without care for the consequences. With an arsenal of deadly weapons, she unleashes the loudest blasts and brightest explosions to leave a trail of mayhem and panic in her wake. Jinx despises boredom, and gleefully brings her own chaotic brand of pandemonium wherever she goes.

Born to a Targonian Aspect at the height of the Rune Wars, Kayle honored her mother's legacy by fighting for justice on wings of divine flame. She and her twin sister Morgana were the protectors of Demacia for many years—until Kayle became disillusioned with the repeated failings of mortals, and abandoned this realm altogether. Still, legends are told of her punishing the unjust with her fiery swords, and many hope that she will one day return…
lolPatch.Summary: E AP ratio decreased, passive wave damage adjusted. R cast time decreased, AoE radius increased, Invulnerability duration adjusted, damage delay increased, magic damage decreased.

Attributes.Name: Ascending
Attributes.Label: removed
Attributes.After: Kayle no longer lowers her range when casting ult on herself

lolPatch.champAbout: A war hero from a bygone era, Sion was revered in Noxus for choking the life out of a Demacian king with his bare hands—but, denied oblivion, he was resurrected to serve his empire even in death. His indiscriminate slaughter claimed all who stood in his way, regardless of allegiance, proving he no longer retained his former humanity. Even so, with crude armor bolted onto rotten flesh, Sion continues to charge into battle with reckless abandon, struggling to remember his true self between the swings of his mighty axe.

Jericho Swain is the visionary ruler of Noxus, an expansionist nation that reveres only strength. Though he was cast down and crippled in the Ionian wars, his left arm severed, he seized control of the empire with ruthless determination… and a new, demonic hand. Now, Swain commands from the front lines, marching against a coming darkness that only he can see—in glimpses gathered by shadowy ravens from the corpses all around him. In a swirl of sacrifice and secrets, the greatest secret of all is that the true enemy lies within.

Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe. Some have mistaken her compassion for weakness and paid the ultimate price—for beneath Taliyah's youthful demeanor is a will strong enough to move mountains, and a spirit fierce enough to make the earth itself tremble.

Attributes.Name: Cast Lockout
Attributes.Label: buff
Attributes.Before: whenever Taliyah takes or deals damage

lolPatch.champAbout: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submission—not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his massive club of True Ice at the ready, he chills his enemies to the bone and impales them with jagged, frozen pillars, laughing as they bleed out onto the tundra.
lolPatch.Summary: Base attack speed increased, base mana increased.

lolPatch.champAbout: To those who still revere him, the Volibear is the storm made manifest. Destructive, wild, and stubbornly resolute, he existed before mortals walked the Freljord's tundra, and is fiercely protective of the lands that he and his demi-god kin created. Cultivating a deep hatred of civilization and the weakness it brought with it, he now fights to return to the old ways—when the land was untamed, and blood spilled freely—and eagerly battles all who oppose him, with tooth, claw, and thundering domination.

Attributes.Name: Heal Ratio Based on Missing Health
Attributes.Label: buff
